name: Series Graph
tagline: See every series & movies true rating at a glance
description: Series Graph is a modern TV & movie companion that turns raw IMDb ratings into beautiful episode‚Äëby‚Äëepisode heatmaps See instantly which seasons peak, which episodes to skip, and where to stream without ever seeing a single ad Visual heatmaps built from IMDb ratings for each season and episode, so you instantly spot the gems and avoid the filler. Track what you‚Äôve watched Mark episodes and movies as watched, see your progress across seasons, and keep your watch history synced across devices

name: Strater AI
tagline: Turn any video, PDF, or web page into your personal AI tutor
description: Strater AI transforms any YouTube video, PDF, or website into structured learning experiences. Summarize, chat, test yourself with AI-generated quizzes and flashcards,all powered by context-aware LLMs. Learn faster, remember longer, and focus on what matters.

name: Inference Engine by GMI Cloud
tagline: Fast multimodal-native inference at scale
description: GMI Inference Engine is a multimodal-native inference platform that runs text, image, video and audio in one unified pipeline. Get enterprise-grade scaling, observability, model versioning, and 5‚Äì6√ó faster inference so your multimodal apps run in real time.

name: PowerWash Simulator
tagline: The original clean, on any screen
description: Go back to where it all began and clean up the streets of Muckingham on your Apple devices! PowerWash Simulator is now available on iPhone, iPad, Mac, Vision Pro and Apple TV via Apple Arcade

name: MCPTotal
tagline: Secure MCP servers that just work
description: Deploy and manage secure MCP servers instantly with zero-conf. Connect AI agents to 100+ business tools through our Secure Hub. Monitor MCP traffic and control access in real-time with our Gateway. Connect AI models to local tools with our Desktop app.

name: There
tagline: ü™ê Your cosmic compass through the galaxy
description: A browser-native cosmic compass that shows the real-time positions of the solar system‚Äôs planets from your exact place and moment in time. It uses your device‚Äôs sensors to guide a precise 3D arrow in real time, all locally and without installation or accounts. Open it in your browser, turn around, and see how the planets align around you.

name: Hohoho: Secret Santa
tagline: Secret Santa with Distant Family, Remote Team or Friends!
description: Run a Remote Secret Santa with your family, team, or friends anywhere in the world. Add your sizes, allergies, and interests so every gift actually fits. No messy paper draws, no repeats! just create, share, and you‚Äôre done. 100% free.

name: Infira
tagline: AI that turns complex ideas into clear visuals
description: Infira is a multidimensional learning engine that turns complex topics into living, visual experiences. Flowcharts that pulse, timelines that breathe, and 3D concept maps that build themselves ‚Äî all designed to help you understand faster, remember longer, and think deeper.

name: Vector
tagline: Intelligent search for macOS
description: Lightning-fast search powered by on-device machine learning. Find apps, files, messages, and more ‚Äî all without compromising your privacy.

name: CastReader
tagline: AI Text to Speech Reader
description: CastReader is a AI Text to Speech Reader that visualizes characters & dialogue. Get matched voices, animated scenes, and character maps for immersive reading

name: Peargent
tagline: AI Agents Made Simple
description: Peargent is a lightweight, Python-first framework for building powerful AI agents without complexity. It gives developers a clean API, built-in memory, tool integration, and observability - so you can focus on logic, not boilerplate. Build production-ready agents in minutes with type safety, simplicity, and full control. Open-source and free.

name: Transfigurator
tagline: Fast, private image converter - 100% local processing on Mac
description: 100% local processing - your images never leave your Mac. No internet, no cloud, no data transmission. Complete privacy with lightning-fast batch conversion, custom presets, and support for modern formats like AVIF and WebP. One-time purchase, no subscriptions.

name: Bgblur
tagline: Blur faces, plates, and awkward photobombs.
description: AI-powered video privacy tool that automatically blurs faces, license plates, and backgrounds with motion tracking‚Äîno manual editing needed. Upload your video, select what to blur, and export in HD (MP4, MOV, WebM). Perfect for vloggers filming in public, dashcam footage, educational content with crowds, or any creator who needs to protect privacy without spending hours on frame-by-frame edits. Includes batch processing for multiple videos, real-time preview, and adjustable blur intensity.

name: FlowEngine
tagline: n8n made easy- deploy AI flows in seconds
description: n8n is powerful, but setting up infrastructure and authentication slows you down. Flowengine removes those barriers so you can focus purely on logic. We provide a ready-to-use ecosystem with pre-configured API keys and an integrated AI builder that generates your workflow structure instantly. You skip the server maintenance and credential hunting entirely, taking you from idea to live automation in under a minute.

name: Arkhet
tagline: AI prototyping with wireframes, not prompts
description: Arkhet is visual-first AI prototyping for product teams. Wireframe your layout, annotate interactions on the canvas, and generate interactive prototypes, without writing text prompts. Built for product discovery, not production code.

name: Whenever
tagline: 24/7 Coach to build your startup without burning out
description: Whenever is the personalised AI coach for founders. It collects your health and work patterns and turns them into a tailor-made protocol so you can grow your startup by improving the real engine of your company: yourself.

name: FocusKit
tagline: The clean pomodoro experience for iOS
description: FocusKit is the ultimate Pomodoro timer app to help you build a habit of focusing. Track your progress, stay motivated, and achieve your goals.

name: Wrapped 2025
tagline: Wrapped but for your iMessage & WhatsApp
description: Your 2025 texting habits, exposed. See your most texted contacts, response time, personality type, and more. Works with iMessage and WhatsApp. 100% local, runs in 30 seconds on your Mac.

name: Octoparse AI
tagline: Build RPA bots at the Speed of Thought
description: Octoparse AI is a lightweight no-code RPA tool that lets teams build drag-and-drop automation workflow for websites and desktop apps. The AI Copilot generates a runnable workflow in minutes, so non-technical users automate complex tasks fast. No dragging. No writing. Just describe your task and let AI build the RPA bot for you. Core features are permanently free, making powerful automation accessible to everyone.

name: AI Note Taker
tagline: AI Note Taker: Never Take Notes Again
description: Notium is your personal note taker for meetings, lectures and more. Unlike all other AI Note Taker apps, Notium syncs securely with iCloud ensuring your notes are always backed up and available. With Notium, you can record notes, upload audio or paste any text you need summarised to easily get the key points, action items and summary.
